content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on my patio watching the sun set. on the herrizone i saw this object that looked like it was coming out of the ocean. i made a commit to my customer to look. no one could figure out what it was. by now there is about 30 people outside looking. it came straight up out over the water. very slowly and made no sound. it  was round  looked like it had  windows with red lights in the middle and one solid white light under the bottom they did not blink, but they were  bright. when it got over the land it continaled for another 7 to 10 mins. it was all most dark. we tryed to get a picture but no one had a camra. one of my workers took a picture with his cell phone but it looked like a light could not make it out.Then it took a right turn and flew for another 3 or 4 mins, then matter of seconds it was gone
content.summary: Came out of the ocean,straight up very slowly made right turn the was gone

content.detailedDescription: Was driving on i-95 going south to miami but the sighting was in broward county florida, it was approx. 6-7pm, what made me notice the object was the strange color.  i lost sight of the object because it was not in sight anymore.  when you blow up the picture the object on the top left hand side is the object i'm speaking about the red-orange color and white around it that looks like lights. the object look strange to me never seen anything like it. would like to hear your feedback on the object in the sky.  thank you
content.summary: Saw strange object in sky, and took pictures

content.detailedDescription: I was driving my girlfriends car after getting taco bell and on our way back we looked at the moon and saw something that almost looked like a star or satellite moving downward towards the moon. when it came lower its stopped and sort of wobbled downwards the out of nowhere disappeared. my girlfriend thought it was a satellite until it disappeared, we both sort of shrugged it off but are still a little curious about it.
content.summary: Starlike light headed towards moon

content.detailedDescription:
1. broadway, n.J.,    hunting in treestand
2. decended over tree line at approximately half mile
3. what the hell is it? intelligent control, coming this way,  heading directly at my brother some 600 yards away 
4. white, yellow ,glowing orb. moved without sound very slowly.  it illuminated the corn as it moved under what can only be described as intelligent control. we observed the object for 35 minutes. it floated over the tree line and out of sight
5. at first curious...  what is it... not a helicopter,  not a balloon,  not a plane,  not a flare or natural event....  what is it?!
   confused, disbelief, frightened,  spooked  
   i left my bow hanging on the hook in the tree,  climbed down and ran 500 yards back to my car. i will go out for breakfast and come back later to get my brother, i thought. as i got to the paved road, i noticed my brother speedily walking toward me.  "why'd ya' come down early bro.?"...", i asked.... "did you see that f...In' light?!",  he responded
   we don't talk about it and i will never hunt that property again. this completely freaked us out. we are not the type of people that are freaked out by anything.
   i am convinced it was extratestrial.
6.Maneuvered over tree line and out of sight
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 35 minute multipule sighting round glowing orb

content.detailedDescription:
Clear night stars and moon viable ..Uncle pointed out object in the sky which seemed to be flowting, object was flowting towards the north west keeping its speed and altitude..The cercular object seemed to be tilted and had a dark center , center was not transparent. there was no sound coming from object no smoke trail ether. object just continued to move till it vanished.
we had no words to discrib what we saw but we know it was not a human driven craft of any kind
content.summary: It was a circle that looked like it was on fire headed north west

content.detailedDescription: I have seen different types..The one that was over my head was the size of a football field. the others all i could see was the lights it was late at night after midnight.And some foggy..But a as it hovered.As it knew we seen them they slowly followed as we got scared .And got home we could send in the sky there are more than one..Back in 1985i lost time and i got home around 11when i left my cousins home at 8pm.On the tv.Said"us sure force chanced 4: to.Up yo 600 miles hour ..And i have seen a lot in the last 27 years i'm scared to say i seen them but know what i have seen and still seeing as well as others now.It's very active around my house ..In 1985after i stuck my head out the window i realized it was a : to.As i couldn't talk but could think.And ask them to please don't hurt me and my baby. the nested morning my ear was scab i was in all
content.summary: Lights hovering.Fliating fast take off

content.detailedDescription:
Taking pictures of the trails in the cloud.
i did t notice it until i looked at the images i shot.
i didn't know what it was, just that i knew what it wasn't.
i saw no motion, it was gone ing the time my next image was shot.
i was a little unnerved and uncomfortable.
it disappeared.
content.summary: Taking random images of the sky and caught this is one photo.  i was looking at strange trails in the clouds as if something was swiping through, leaving noticeable trails in otherwise fluffy clouds in a blue sky.

content.detailedDescription: Father up at night woke all up to look at object then after watching it for several minutes we followed it until it took off in an arc at a very high rate of speed we were very scared. the object hovered for a while and my father took us for  a ride to follow it we followed it for  around 5-10 minutes. the object acsended super fast from around 20 miles an hr to so fast u could not see it.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Fort know ky at night family watched from window then followed

content.detailedDescription: I walked out of my home, early morning about 4:45 a.M. e.S.T., and viewed three unknowns traveling southward at tree top level.  they were traveling at or about 10 m.P.H. once they crossed 70th and palm river road (google home address) they were at tree top level in front of my home about to pass.  i shouted "good morning fellas, are you in a hurry to get somewhere?"  the third stopped in front of my home, at tree top, while the other two continued southward.  i than said, "would you like to have some breakfast?"  there was no response.  it hovered.  i stepped out from my front door, onto my walkway (google home front) and said, "don't just hover, come on down and let's speak with each other."  it surprised me with a five foot (or more) descended just above my neighbor's high oak (google the front of my home, do a reverse view and see my neighbor's high oak).  it stopped, hovered, brighten up more, and ascended straight up and and southward.  i assumed it was attempting to catch up with his friends.  this isn't my first viewing, my daughter (currently age 22) who was 19 or 20 at the time, bear witness of our first viewing (together).  i have viewed these guys often, beginning at/or about 11:p.M. through 1:a.M., e.S.T., from time to time.  but this was a first close up.  i'm a school teacher, and i value my employment.  if this gets out, i'll become a political tool and tossed aside.  i'll share with you what i've discussed here, but it must not become "public".
content.summary: Three round objects, traveling south, one responded to voice command...

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving home to morton  back from peoria when a light in the sky caught my attention . that's when i realized there were two glowing orbs . they were aprox  100 yards apart . staying exactly in line with one another. i watched them for about 15 mins they didn't moved but suddenly just faded away until i could no longer see them.



being night and the fact i was driving its hard to judge how far away the objects were. i couldn't make out any details other than shape and colors. 
so i suspect at least a few miles .

similar has been sited in this area several times in the last year or so.

this i'd the second ufo i've seen in a year as well. the other was a triangle not a orb like these.
content.summary: 2 glowing metallic orbs floating in the sky. suddenly faded then vanished

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: Me and my friend went outside for a smoke break at work. i looked to the west and saw a red dot in the sky. i said to my friend" he look there's a ufo!" in a joking way and then upon looking harder, we both stared at it and could not figure out what it was. it started to rise up as a red dot and in the blink of an eye it turned black and shifed into a weird shaped object. it was kind of shaped like a strange airplane but much smaller/ it was high up but not as high as an airplane. we live close to an airport so we see them all the time. at the time this was occurring, there were about 3 other airplanes high up in the airspace(not all at once). the object then flew from the west towards the east going at a fast speed for the altitude it was in. it had no lights and made no sound. after it flew about 200-300 ft east it disappeared. we both saw it happen and reacted at the same time. i saw it reappear and disappear again but she did not see it because a power pole was obstructing from her angle.
content.summary: Say glowing red circle, it turned black, shifted form, and flew to the east, dissapearring twice

content.detailedDescription: I was walking to work about 6,30 am when i look to my right and seen a shooting star travaling about 20 mph above tree line it was white and blue but seemed to burned out but then when light went out thre was a object abit smaller than a baskit ball whitch was a dull black colure and it just travaled then changed direction under control some how. my feelings at the time was godsmackt but glad i seen what i seen and glad i can share wat i have experenced on here thank you ian uk .
content.summary: Walking to work then seen a shooting star above tree line then it burnt out and seen black ball glinding no sound under control

content.detailedDescription: I was driving to work around 530 am coming from the downtown of kc. i notice a orange light in the distance near the paso bridge. i thought nothing of it but its a helicopter.  the closer i got i noticed it wasnt leaving the area it flew over the amusement park worlds of fun. so i saod to my self it wasnt a helicopter but maybe a plane in the wrong flight pattern.  i had others in my vehical that saw the same thing. no one said anything until we got within a mile ththats when we all spoke. it appeared to be like a almond on fire not sure of the speed but it was but it was large coming east to west slow pace no flashing lights but a brightly cover tail
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: Glowing aircraft's

content.detailedDescription:
this was not a ufo sighting , i don`t know who to contact or talk to. i`ve experienced paranormal acivity most of my life, but the last year  in 2 separate events things have become physical .  
january 29th 2013 i went  to bed @ 2am and woke up @ shortly after 6am , ran my hands through my hair and felt a clump of something , i pulled my hand down and it was covered in blood and a bit of hair , totally shocked i angled the medicine cabinet mirror into the bathroom mirror and bent over backwards to get a look at what the blood was coming from .

when i saw i almost fell to my knees , there was a perfect large  y shaped incision on the top of my head !? i live alone , and in no possible way could have or would have done this to myself  . i have documeted the healing of the y scar  by taking photos every other day  , and i still can`t believe it when i look into the mirror and see it ontop of my head, but it`s all too real. 

if anyone knows  someone i can talk to  or send all of my data to please let me know. thanks .
content.summary: woke up with blood ontop of head , found a perfect y shaped incision on head

content.detailedDescription:
Driving southbound on the 15fwy about to pass toms farms.  on the opposite side of the freeway i see a huge red ball of light slowly descending.  i sped up to see it's path as the hills it was over obstructed my view and when i did so i lost sight of it.  

*note: this is the second time i have seen a ufo in this exact location.  the first time was about a year ago on the other side of the hills and was 3 (points) of white lights that formed a triangle and seemed to quickly pass right alongside the freeway going north.
content.summary: Large bright red-orange light descending slowly treetop-level over hills

content.detailedDescription: Was telling some friends goodbye, after an evening of boating. noticed an unusual orange glowing ball hovering over clear lake. watched this for about 3 minutes, making move changes, but no noise whatsoever. approx. range was a mile and one half. after several direction changes it disappeared. about 30 minutes later, the same object appeared in the same area, but a little further east. we observed it for a couple of minutes.Then it disappeared, like before. this was 10 times bigger than any other aviation light, we have seen in the area. we are used to seeing coast guard helicopter and various other airplanes at the same altitude. this was definitely strange and different.
content.summary: Glowing orange ball, hovering in pattern over clear lake, changing directions

content.detailedDescription: I stepped outside at 3:30am to have a cigarette and observed a red pulsating strobe in the se sky.  looking at the strobe which was traveling se i thought to myself - this is either a late night cargo flight to milwaukee or a red-eye flight.  i then observed a non pulsating light in front of the object in the same trajectory of flight.  that got me confused and excited as i thought wow this actually might be a military exercise of some sort.  the red strobe object was in trail and after about 30 seconds of observation i heard a distant roaring sound that's familiar to me as an f-16.  they fly daily from truax field here in madison, home of the national guards 115th fighter wing.  they often fly directly overhead at low altitude, and most residents here are familiar with their distinct sound.  then the steady light object in the lead made an abrupt 90 degree turn straight down at a speed that made my heart skip a beat.  the decent took about 2 seconds and i lost sight of it beyond the tree line.  my conservative estimation is that it dropped more than ten thousand feet in those 2 seconds.  the strobe object in trail turned down to follow it, but was nowhere near as fast.  i'm making this report because no possible estimation of the speed of decent can convince me this was a conventional aircraft or even a drone.  immediately after i lost visual on both objects i saw a third bluish non strobe star like object directly over where the first two objects descended.  it seemed to me that it appeared from very high altitude.  it hovered in the sky and then slowly dropped down behind the tree line.  there was no noise.  if it was a drone being tested at night there wouldn't have been a fighter in trail, nor would the non strobe object be illuminated at all.  my only logical explanation is that i saw a commercial aircraft and also a satellite.  at the moment i lost sight of the satellite a meteor came down at 90 degrees directly over it.  this seems impossibly unlikely.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: F-16 in trail of non strobe object which made rapid decent straight down without changing speed.

content.detailedDescription: On the 28th november i kept popping out of my front door to look for visible colour changes to the moon as an eclipse was due that evening, it got to 2am and i thought i would have one last look before going to bed. i was out on my front path when i noticed a bright white star like object in the sky where there shouldnt have been one, i stargaze quite a bit so know what should be where in the night sky. as i watched it i realized it was moving towards me travelling from south to north and as it did it seemed to uncover another behind it which was lemon in colour, this was followed by five more white ones, one more lemon then another white, 9 in total all perfectly spaced,all solid round balls, bright but not glowing, by the time this last one appeard the first was overhead, i would say as high as a transatlantic flight but with no noise at all, im use to planes going over as we are on a flight path and we do faintly hear a rumble of the engines, these were silent. by the time the last was made visible the 1st object was overhead, the time it took them all in a long line to go diagonally over my house and disappear over the horizon to the north was less than a minute. we do live by a marine base but if this was aircraft on night training its like nothing ive seen before, the silence and speed made it quite scarey. i went in locked up and went to bed but its played on my mind since as it was so creepy, unusual,strange and so weird i felt i needed to inform somebody.
content.summary: Outside my front door to see if i could observe lunar changes due to expected eclipse, see what  initially looks like a star, realized no star should be in that position. object moving towards me then another and more and more.

content.detailedDescription: We were walking the dog, and noticed a strange red light floating toward us, followed by a second light.   there was no sound.   we are used to seeing airplanes but this was not the same path and was definitely not an airplane.   it was much to low.  then, a black orb was observed crossing under the full moon.   just as quickly the red lights just disappeared into the night sky.  we continued our walk home and suddenly two more lights appeared in the same path following each other in a straight line, they too disappeared.  fortunately, we ran into another dog walking neighbor and we pointed them out to him.  he watched one as one disappeared.  our neighborhood loop is 4/10 of a mile.  i was certain more were to follow but none came.  they reminded us of a red lantern, but not aware of any celebrations in the area.
content.summary: Glowing red lantern-like objects. they disappeared from the sky. 3 witnesses.

content.detailedDescription: I was on my deck taking pics of the sky,as i was looking through my camera i noticed a shiny white object. not sure if it came out of a cloud or just materialized. but when i did notice it i started snapping,i have about 30 stills of the object. this is not the first time i think i have this object recorded. in the middle of january i was having my roof replaced so i would go on the deck and take pics of them working. this time though i was using the movie function on the camera and had it on a tripod,i did not notice this one till i reviewed the couple minutes of footage.For about ten seconds it shows a very bright object moving between clouds decending. this time i was shocked to see it so well. even thogh inthink if i was not looking through the camera i might have missed it entirely. for a couple of seconds it was in view,it moved like it was folding in on it self,also it moved very fast like zig zagging. as far as what i thought it maybe if you ever seen pics of the smaller so called energy orbs that you would get by taking pics in a cemetery. been then i thought it would have to be the size of a 50 " tv. i have to say i was very excited and pleased that it showed itself to me, becouse it was cold and i would almost bet no one else in the valley was out taking pics. finaly as how i lost sight of it from all the pics you could tell it rised higher in the sky and phased out. i just kept snapping until i couldn't see it any more. thanks for listening ,and by chance you would like all thirty pics to see it how i did send an email and i would be happy to send all of them. pretty amazing !
content.summary: Looking through my cannon eos with a 55-250 lens saw a white object snapped about  30 stills.

content.detailedDescription: This happened at roughly 4pm yesterday over okc.  i was at hefner and penn area in my car.  i saw this object leaving a contrail but when i looked close was clearly huge.  i had to lok up at roughly 50 degrees to follow it as it constantly changed course and speed  it also left a contrail from both sides of the object  and i would estimate it was at roughly 40 to 50,0000 ft height.  it was traveling in a sw direction and if the true south direction was where i was at looking south then it was roughly 10 degrees off south. i was able to follow the object for about 5 minutes before i lost sight of it.  since i am ex military and was a drill sergeant to boot i knew instantly this was not a aircraft of any sort i am aware of.  once i lost sight of the object when i went behind a building i lost sight of it and even when i came out from behind i did not see it again.
content.summary: Cylindrical but huge even from distance. left contrail from both sides. constantly changed direc/speed.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on my patio when i saw a peculiar bright light resembling a star yet it was too low to be one. at first i thought it was a star but then i noticed it was moving at a steady pace. i felt a sense of urgency to take a picture of the object since this wasn't the first time i've witness a strange sighting like this. however, i've learned to always bring my camera and keep it powered on. i felt a sense of excitement after seeing the object. i lost sight of the object shortly as after taking the picture. what really surprised me is what i saw when i reviewed the photo. i didn't use the flash being that i didn't want to drown out the brightness of the object.
content.summary: I was sitting on my patio when i saw a peculiar bright light. i had just enough time to snap on picture using my cannon digital camera without the flash and what i saw surprised me.

content.detailedDescription: Jan 27th 2013 sun around 4:00pm, i was taking pictrues of the sky as i saw what looked to be a diamond triangle silver in color moving over my house heading to the north towards friendship circle. the size looked to be bigger then a basketball, about 1 to 2 feet bigger. also note a jet behind the ufo in the background. p.S. i did a report the night of jan 27th 2013 and can not find it on your website, so i am reporting it for the 2nd time.
content.summary: Jan 27th sun 2013,taking pictures of sky around 4:00pm  as i  saw a silver diamond ufo moving over my house.

content.detailedDescription: Me and my girlfriend were just leaving my house and we stoped at a stop sign. the we noticed a glowing orange light. it seemed about golf ball size from where we sat but i couldnt say the true size. and it seemed to be moving very slow. it was coming diagonally from left.  and it was only getting slower. then it was just hovering. then slowly it made a sharp diagonal turn to the right. it was moving away from us. and it seemed to getting smaller ass it went up. as if going into space. then as we were watching this one disappear, a larger one came up sharply from the left. it hovered in the same spot as the other. then it started a slow diagonal ascension  in the same spot as the other and flew away in the same direction as the other. as if following it. by now the first one was gone. and soon after the other one disappeared to. my girlfriend has also witnessed another ufo sighting in our town a few months before. i took video but it did not turn out
content.summary: Me and my girlfriend saw an orange light glowing and moving in a direction our way so we watched then it was flying away slowly diagonally  away from us when another light came up diagonally and disappeared  in the same direction of the first light

content.detailedDescription: Coming from sfo to sal after 1 hour of flight at the captains window i saw a bright light , it was steady yellow very bright , the captain was chatting with me ...But i was looking at this star like bright ligth , suddenly it intensity decreases , below it was a star 5 degrees above the horizon , in my phone i have a constellation map but i can not turn on my cell phone , that light was very high to be an acft on departure or app , because as an inernational rule lights are off above 10000 feet , we were leveled at fl 350 ...Usually at that fl you see red , green , white navigation lights ...The light simply dims in a 5 mins period , after that in the 30 degree direction i just saw a very far away star or could be dimmed by the moonshine .
content.summary: Flying thru central america in an a320 aircraft as fo , i saw that line in the direction of phoenix ..

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
It was 8:45 in the evening and i was taking the dog out.  as i walked out the door to let the dog out, i always make it a habit to look up at the sky to see what the stars look like for the evening.  today was a bonus!  as i looked out to the west i saw a red glowing orb moving slowly towards the east.  i saw it go overhead above the condo unit i live in.  curiosity got the best of me and i walked out and around the building to see if i could continue seeing it.  as i tried looking for it, i saw another red/orange orb following the same path the first one went through.  as i fumbled for my phone to see if i could record it, i saw a third red/orange orb following the exact path and moving slowly.  that is what i was able to capture on the video, the 3rd object.

the whole event lasted about 3mins.  all of the glowing lights appeared to be above & below the clouds as i could see the clouds affecting the glow.  which made it appear randomly pulsating.  but i'm not sure if that was the clouds.  it definately did not have blinking lights, like a plane normally does.  this was different.  and relatively big in the sky.  it made no noise and it kept a consistent slow speed across the sky.  it went directly overhead.

the best way to visually describe it is like looking at a slightly out of focus point of light moving across the sky.
content.summary: 3 glowing orbs traveling slowly from west to east

content.detailedDescription: About 6:15pm, 2/22/13 in south san jose we saw a black rectangular line in the sky. i was getting the car keys from one of the witnesses and noticed the object just over their right shoulder in the sky. we thought it was a stray balloon at first but quickly realized it wasn't. it was moving south, slowly and in a steady path. when the other 2 witnesses saw it, it seemed to turn and look oval and then triangular. it was solid black on the 3 sides in color except the middle which looked see-through. one side was not as straight or as wide as the other 2. one witness said it looked like a person was in the middle. it seemed to turn and spin slowly as we looked at it. i turned the car off, and listened for any sounds coming from the direction of the object and there were none. there were no airplanes, helicopters, birds, etc. it was not a balloon simply for the deliberate path it was taking. it wasn't floating or moving in the wind. we watched it for a good 5-6 minutes and it started moving farther away towards los gatos direction. we all felt a little scared. we had no idea what it was. i was kind of frozen watching it. i had dreams about it the same night. we watched it as we were walking towards our stairs and when we looked back for it within about 2 seconds and it was ascending and then it was gone. it was the darkest black object i'd ever seen.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Shape changing ufo south san jose

content.detailedDescription: Please see my one-time post on you-tube by searching "rb-47" and picking what is at this time the first reference on that page, 2 entries under the id of larrypok. in the last few months ( this being currently 2/2013 ) i have asked my brother if he remembered the meteror on sumter and he said yes. i told him that was no meteror as we thought. i told him of my post, the story and map disclosed as a ufo, he responded right off the bat with that it was totally silent, and then began to stare for several minutes much like living it all over again in his minds eye those many years ago as we stood in the front yard of sumter that night next to each other ( a street that no longer exists, but is a nearby shopping center now ). i can still see the colors wash across his face, his mouth open, the houses and street lit, my girl cousins faces flashing with colors ( just before they went screaming into the house ). i dont care if anyone ever believes me, it bothers me not. thanks.
content.summary: 1957 dallas love field ground siting

content.detailedDescription: I drove to a location in the mountains to commit suicide ,when i got there i got out of the vehicle and walked around it looking at my surroundings as to make sure nobody was watching me while i committed suicide.Afteer about ten to 15 minutes of making peace with it and saying goodbye etc...I was now ready and as i was no more than ten seconds away from pulling the trigger ,i noticed something move out of the corner of my eye ...It upset me because i thought them to be people watching ,but when i looked at them there were two both stood facing me one motionless and the other one leaning back into a strait stance ,was leaning just enough into my periphrial vision that i would see them.They were exactly like the small greys you see like in the roswell accident .This wasn't a terrifying experience .But i also realized just recently after 20 years since the sighting ,that when i went up there to commit suicide it was early,about noon when i ten seconds away from commiting suicide and saw the greys and left it was 11:30pm and there was a full moon thats how i remember seeing them was in the well lit moonlight .It took years for me to actually accept what i saw with my own eyes...And there is not doubt whatsoever 100 % absolutely positively beyond any doubt ...That i saw them 2..Twenty feet away from me ,i even had a loaded gun and couldve shot at them and probibly hit them i had a 357 magnum loaded with the trigger pulled back and ready to fire,when i noticed that i was not alone it simply voided the suicide and i left ,which i thank them for really.
content.summary: Was going to committ suicide and was interupted

content.detailedDescription: This experience i describe has been happening multiple times in my life, i feel summoned outside and they seem to signal me with specific patterns of formation and light signals, usually white brillant flashes but also a red lazer seems to lock with my eyes. im overcome with emotions foriegn to me and feel as if they are trying to tell me things. on a nightly basis i feel summoned outside, so i take a cigarette and sit outside and usually one appears out of nowhere and seems to flash light directly at me. over this week they have flashed beams at my residence which seem to not emit a trial but appear directly by me. i have tried to signal back with a lighter and a led flashlight and they flash specific sequences seemingly in reply. i would dismiss these as regular craft but the movements are not within our current technology as far as i know, i do not believe a human could withstand the sharp angle movements.Last night two of the crafts absorbed into one another and then dropped something out of the newly formed unidentified object. on other occasions i would go for walks and remember taking note of the constelation orion to show my girlfriend right over head, we walked about 50 and both were cold so we returned home, i had apparently lost over an hour of time and only thought to check once i noticed that orion was now on the horizon when it was almost directly overhead moments before. its difficult scribing my events because of the constant headaches. i only chose to write this after me and my girlfriend started getting odd bruises and markings that we couldnt figure out how we got. she then said that we should check on symptoms of alien abduction which led me here. i believe that if i were ask questions by someone with more knowledge of these abnormalities i would be able to articulate it better, i have not been sleeping and feel a bit confused in trying to express this. also at odd intervals of the night i feel summoned to go outside and they once again appear, this has been happening over a week straight now. my girlfriend has seen them with me everytime. and when she was alone would not see them unless i walked outside and and thought about them. its an uneasy feeling and have multiple physical problems since these more recent experiences, including but not limited to odd pains in specific parts of my body accompanied by bruising and raised and dented skin among other things. im searching for answers. once again this has been on going my entire life since i can remember. i have a better memory than anyone of my friends or family and find it extremely odd that i have large periods of my life missing from my memory as a child and now more recently as an adult i have been taking more notice to these instances, when as a child i brushed all of it off as nightmares or some sort of acute ptsd.
content.summary: Changing color, lazer light direct to me, absorbed other craft
